√dhā1 'put'

present: [3.] dádhati  dhatté etc. V.+   -- [1.] dádhati  dádhate etc. V.+   -- [2.] dhāti   -- [4.] dhāyeta  adhāyata  

perfect: dadhaú  dadhé etc. V.+  dadhā́tha  dadhidhvé  dadhiṣvá  dadhidhvam  dadhre  

aorist: [1.] ádhāt  adhus etc. V.+  adhītām  dheyām  dheyus  dheyāsus  dhā́tu etc.  dhetana  adhithās  adhita etc. V.+  ahita  hita  adhīmahi  dhāmahe  dhiṣe  dhiṣvá  ádhāyi  dhā́yi V.+   -- [2.] adhat  dhat   -- [4.] dhāsus  dhāsathas  dhāsatha  adhiṣi  adhiṣata B.+  dhiṣīya  dheṣīya   -- [5.] dhāyīs  

future: [1.] dhāsyati  dhāsyate etc. B.+  adhāsyat   -- [2.] dhātā etc.  

verbal: hitá V.+  -dhita  dhā́tum B.+  dhā́tave  dhā́tavaí  dhā́tos  -dhitum  dhitvā́  hitvā  -dhā́ya AV.+  -dhā́m  dhiyádhyai  -dhāyam  

secondary: passive: dhīyáte etc. V.+   -- intensive: dedhīyate   -- desiderative: dhítsati etc. V.+  dhítsate etc. V.+  dhitsyate  dídhiṣati etc.  dídhiṣate etc.  dídhiṣāṇa   -- causative: dhāpayati etc. V.+  dhāpayīta  dhāpyate  adhitsiṣam  

derivatives: -dha V.+  -dhā V.+  -dhā́na V.+  dhānā́?
